amendment.description: To increase appropriations for disaster relief, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 4600 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Point of order that an emergency designation within the amendment violates the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 4600.

Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 4600 (the section within the amendment regarding an emergency designation) rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 199.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 4600.
Amendment SA 4600 ruled out of order by the chair.
